text: the Chinese authorities have imposed a

where the corona virus was first
discovered other cities and who Bay
Province have also have major

across the province have largely shut
down flights have been suspended and
police checkpoints have been set up on
main roads where 26 people have died so
far after contracting the virus which
attacks the respiratory system all of
those deaths have been in China mostly
in and around Wuhan but now there have
been two deaths outside who pay province
for the first time nationally there are

well it's a very strange Chinese New
Year's Eve that's for sure this is the
most important night of the year for
Chinese people and yet the streets in
most Chinese cities are very quiet many
people don't want to leave their homes
for fear of contracting this virus those
who are coming out into the streets are
pretty much all wearing face masks to
stop them from passing and on or from
hopefully lessen the chance of them
catching this sickness in Beijing
everybody from Wuhan who enters the city
whether they have a temperature or not
now has to go into quarantine for 14
days now they can do that at home but
they have to regularly report in to have
their health checked and this just gives
you an idea with the measures being
taken right across the country all of
these public events which you would
normally have for the Chinese New Year
many of them are being called off no
temple fairs in Beijing in Guangdong all
the cinemas have been closed for all of
the Spring Festival in Shanghai
Disneyland closed in the area around
Wuhan many more cities and our following
that cities leads shutting down all of
their public transport coming in and out
of those cities and also within the

down and these are pretty drastic
measures not to fix this problem but to

to bring it under control
